name: Child Survival India
briefDescription: CSI has an integrated community development approach with health, education, child rights and gender as its focus. CSI reaches out to a population about 1,50, 000 every year in various slums and villages across Delhi, Haryana &  Punjab , finding new avenues and alternatives of development for Adolescent girls, underprivileged youth, poor illiterate slum women, female sex workers, truckers, people infected and affected with HIV/AIDS.   We are currently implementing our work around Maternal & Child Health, Water And Sanitation, HIV/AIDS Prevention and Care, Child Rights, Child protection and Education, Women Empowerment  and Community Health care.
